video_title: How to start a Holding Company (full tutorial)

content_profile.title: How to start a Holding Company (full tutorial)

key_takeaways: Solution: Create holding company structure with significant ownership stakes in multiple businesses (Difficulty: advanced)
Growth Tactic: Build community first, then create products for that audience (Channel: community)
Strategy: Community-based product thesis - products with communities outperform non-community products
Strategy: Significant ownership stakes (30-80%) rather than small angel investments
Startup Opportunity: AI tool for hiring to replace expensive search firms (Target: Companies paying high fees for recruitment)

startup_ideas.problem_solved: Expensive recruitment costs (20k mentioned for search)
